name: Residential ZER Home (New)
_description: An ECM that represents a new zero energy ready (ZER) home in warm and moderate climate zones where the baseline is assumed to have all-electric heating & cooling equipment.

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Relative savings are based on BEopt models for select cities in each climate zone and are not necessarily representative. See source for more details.

source_data.title: The Economics of Zero-Energy Homes
source_data.author: Alisa Peterson, Michael Gartman, and Jacob Corvidae

installed_cost_source.notes: Installed costs reflect average incremental costs in each climate zone to achieve ZER status. See source for more details.

source_data.title: The Economics of Zero-Energy Homes
source_data.author: Alisa Peterson, Michael Gartman, and Jacob Corvidae
